name: Feta
title: feta.io
shortDescription: Feta streamlines the meeting process for product and engineering teams by integrating tasks and discussions into a single, manageable workflow. It reduces pre-meeting preparation by syncing tasks from tools like GitHub and Jira into a Kanban view, and enhances post-meeting productivity by automatically updating project management tools with new tasks and comments. An example use case is a development team using Feta to organize daily stand-ups, where they can quickly review open tasks and PRs, discuss blockers, and plan their day effectively.
pros: Integrates with major project management tools
Automates task and meeting note updates
Provides smart meeting summaries and actionable insights
cons: May be overly complex for smaller teams
Potential privacy concerns with extensive data collection
